title: Scrolls
content: of Enfeeblement A beam of enervating energy springs from your fingers. The target deals half damage with weapon attacks using Strength. Scroll of Protection from Evil and Good Protect a creature against aberrations, celestial, elementals, fey, The Fiends, and undead.The target can't be Charmed, Frightened, or possessed by them, and when these creatures attacks it, they do so with disadvantage. Scroll of Guiding Bolt Call forth a beam of light. deals 4d6 Radiant and grants advantage on the next
